text: Hey, Alice. Do you know Lisa? No, I don't think I've had the chance to meet her. Who's Lisa? She's a colleague with long wavy brown hair and bright brown eyes. If you see her today She's wearing a black and green jacket and a beige shirt. Oh, I think I saw her. What does she do on the team? She's a UX UI designer. She's really creative That's interesting. Thanks for the description Tom. I'll make sure to say hi when I run into her

dialogue.text: Hey, Alice. Do you know Lisa?
No, I don't think I've had the chance to meet her. Who's Lisa?
She's a colleague with long wavy brown hair and bright brown eyes. If you see her today
She's wearing a black and green jacket and a beige shirt. Oh, I think I saw her. What does she do on the team?
She's a UX UI designer. She's really creative
That's interesting. Thanks for the description Tom. I'll make sure to say hi when I run into her
